summary: Implement an admin access flow that bypasses Internet Identity by using a backend-canister verified 5-character admin code, showing “Access Granted,” then redirecting users into the full admin dashboard UI with all tools enabled.
architectural_notes: Admin access code must be verified in the backend canister (not frontend-only) and grant access to the full admin dashboard without Internet Identity authentication.
known_issues: User reports they have never been able to access/enter the admin dashboard UI.

existing_features.title: Update the Admin Access page (/admin-access) so it does NOT require an Internet Identity login. Users should be able to type the 5-character access code, submit it, see “Access Granted,” and be automatically redirected into the full admin dashboard UI.

Update the Admin Dashboard route (/admin) gating so that entering the correct admin access code is sufficient to render the full admin dashboard UI with all existing tools/features, without requiring Internet Identity login.

new_feature_requests.summary: Admin page: show 5-character access code form; verify code (7583A) in backend canister; on success display “Access Granted” and auto-redirect to full admin dashboard with no Internet Identity login required

Fix backend admin-code verification so that a case-insensitive match that returns “Access Granted” also grants admin privileges for the same caller principal (so the user can actually enter the admin dashboard after a successful code entry).

projectName: Fix admin access flow to bypass Internet Identity and unlock full admin dashboard via backend-verified code
